pages.text: $(li)The Flamerang is the better version of the $(l:patchouli:tools/quark/pickarang)Pickarang$(/l) because its better durability.$(br)$(li)It can be made in a Smithing table with a Pickarang and a Netherite Ingot.

The Flamerang can be Enchanted with multiples enchantments:$(br)$(li)Tinted$(li)Bane of Arthropods$(li)Mending$(li)Sharpness$(li)Smite$(li)Curse of Vanishing$(li)Imperishable$(li)Lumbering$(li)Efficiency$(li)Umbreaking$(li)Fortune$(li)Silk Touch$(li)Piercing
